tool.name: CDO Climate Data Information Operators
tool.description: to get information on Climate and NWP model data
tool.command: export HOME=`pwd` && cdo '$information.opt' '$infile1' #if str($information.opt) == "diff" or str($information.opt) == "diffn" '$information.infile2' #end if > $info
tool.help:
**CDO Climate Data Information Operators** =======================================================================================================
This tool is a wrapper to the Climate Data Operators (CDO) for all Information Operators.
- CDO Information operators return information about the input file(s). Output is written in a text file. - CDO is a collection of command line Operators to manipulate and analyse Climate and NWP model Data. - There are more than 600 operators available.
- `CDO online documentation <https://code.mpimet.mpg.de/projects/cdo/>`_.
